reasoning: Kaposi's sarcoma incidence from GLOBOCAN 2005: global average ~4.2 per 100k. Skin is most common primary site. High geographic variation due to HHV-8 prevalence and immunocompromised populations (HIV/AIDS).
source: Parkin DM et al. (2005). Global cancer statistics, 2002. CA Cancer J Clin. 55(2):74-108
